extension.name: DJ-MegaMenu - Mobile Menu Button
extension.author: DJ-Extensions.com
extension.description: Place the Mobile Menu Button in any module position of your template.

field.name: module
field.label: DJ-MegaMenu Module
field.query: SELECT id AS value, concat(title, ' (ID: ', id ,')') AS module FROM #__modules WHERE module='mod_djmegamenu'
